text: Ngoshintsho kusuka engxenyeni yesine kuye engxenyeni yokusubatha kwemayela, isivinini siba esingabalulekile kakhulu futhi ukukhuthazela kuba isidingo ngokuphelele.
Buka ukuthi inkampani ikhangisa ngaluphi uhambo, kungaba kuyiwebhusayithi noma efasiteleni lesitolo.
Abantu beDolobha lase-Vatican bacishe babe ngu-800. Izwe elizimele elincane kunalo wonke emhlabeni nezwe elinabantu abancane kunabo bonke.
Isilingo sika-Hershey no-Chase bekungokunye kokusikisela okuhamba phampili kokuthi iDNA isakhi sofuzo.
Iziqhingi zoMpheki isiqhingi esiyizwe elizihlanganise ngokuzithandela neNyuzilandi, ezisePholinesiya, phakathi Nolwandlekazi iNingizimu Phasifiki.
Uma ufuna ukufunda ukuphonsa ibhumerangi ebuyela esandleni sakho, qinisekisa ukuthi unebhumerangi efanelekela ukubuya.

Ukushushuluza eqhweni wehla entabeni njengomhlalo kuhlehlela emuva okungenani ekhulwini lama-17 leminyaka, futhi ngo-1861 iqembu lokushushuluza eqhweni kokuzilibazisa lavulwa abantu baseNorway e-Australia.
Ingenye yezindawo ezivakashelwa kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ithathwa njengendawo eyaziwa kakhulu kumaPaki weZwe waseNingizimu Afrika (SANParks).
Umculo kaningi urekhodwa kusetshenziswa amakhompyutha ayinkimbinkimbi ukusebenzisa kanye nokuhlanganisa imisindo ndawonye.
Ngokwesibonelo, othile angathi imoto iholela ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo.

Amaloli athutha imfucumfucu ayesetshenziselwa ukuvimba izindawo zokungena ojantshini ohamba ngaphansi komhlaba futhi usizo lwamaphoyisa angu-80 belukhona ukuqondisa abashayeli bezimoto kwezinye izindlela.
UDkt. Tony Moll wathola Ixhwala Elimelene Nemithi Kakhulu (iXDR-TB) esindeni esiseNingizimu Afrika KwaZulu-Natal.
UJenene James Ewing ebengathatha amasosha angu-700 ngaphesheya komfula eTrenton Ferry, athathe ibhuloho eMfudlaneni i-Assunpink futhi avimbele amabutho wesitha ukuba abaleke.
Igama elithi safari ngokuvamile lisetshenziselwa ukubhekisela ohambweni lokunqamula izwe ukuze ubone izilwane zasendle ezihlaba umxhwele zase-Afrika, ikakhulukazi emathafeni.
IMetroRail inezigaba ezimbili zezitimela zabagibeli eKapa kanye nasezindaweni ezizungezile: iMetroPlus (ebuye ibizwe ngokuthi Isigaba Esiphezulu) kanye neMetro (ebizwa ngeSigaba Sesithathu).
I-cell ivela egameni lesiLatin elithi cella elisho igumbi elincane.
Isimiso Sezinzwa sakha uzinzo ngokuthumela umuzwa wokufisa emzimbeni wonke ukuze ugcine umjikelezo wegazi uqhubeka ungaphazamiseki.
Ingxubaniso ngokuyisisekelo ingxube yezinsimbi ezimbili noma ngaphezulu. Ungakhohlwa ukuthi kunezakhi eziningi eshadini lezakhi zamakhemikhali.
Umbukiso ekuqaleni ububonisa abalingisi bezwi abangama-amateur, basendaweni empumalanga yeTexas.
Uma kuxoxwa naye, uthe uhlobo olusha “luyakhathaza kakhulu futhi luyashaqisa ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lokubulala.”
Amaphesenti angu-34 walabo abavotayo unalombono, ufuna Indlovukazi u-Elizabeth II ukuba abe umbusi wokugcina wase-Australia.
Ukuhamba emini kuhlanganisa amabanga angaphansi kwemayela kuze kube semabangeni angahlanganiswa ngosuku olulodwa.
Izikhukhula zehle, okubandakanya skiing futhi manjehibilika eqhweni iyimidlalo ethandwayo efaka ukwehlela phansi indawo embozwe yiqhwa nge skis noma ibhodi leqhwa elinanyathe izinyawo zakho.
"Ngokusekelwe kulomvubukulo, lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuhlukana okwangaphambili kakhulu kunalokho okwakusikiselwa ubufakazi bamangqamuzana.
Uma uvakashela iZwe Eliluhlaza ngenkathi ebandayo (ngokubona ukuthi uma uya enyakatho nakakhulu, kuya kubanda), kubalulekile ukuphatha okokugqoka okufudumele ngokwanele.
Indlela elula kakhulu yokuqalisa ebhizinisini lokubhala ngohambo ukuthuthukisa amakhono wakho kuyibhulogi yewebhusayithi yokuhamba emisiwe.

Empeleni, amakhodi wendawo awasebenzi nakancane ekukopeni okungekho emthethweni; ukukopa kwe-bit nge-bit kwediski kuzoyenza idlale kahle kunoma iyiphi idivayisi lapho idiski yangempela ingadlala khona.
Lesi sifo sitholakala ezingulubeni, esidlulela ebantwini ngominyane.
Ayebukeka njengamakamelo. Wayengumuntu wokuqala wokuhlola amangqamuzana afile.
Idolabha laseBeijing eShayina lizokwengamela Imidlalo yama-Olimpikhi Asebusika ngo-2022, nokuzoyenza idolabha lokuqala lokubungaza yomibili imidlalo yama-Olimpikhi yasebusika nasehlobo.
I-Oyapock River Bridge ibhuloho eliphaswe ngamakhebula ensimbi. Liwelela uMfula i-Oyapock uhlanganisa amadolobha ase-Oiapque eBrazil kanye neSaint-Georges de I'Oyapock eFrench Guiana.
Abantu abaningi babhukha indawo yabo kusenesikhathi (njengoba izikebhe ziyaye zisheshe ukugcwala ngezikhathi ezimatasa zonyaka).
Amahostela ahlalisa abantu abasha ngokuyinhloko – isivakashi esivamile siseminyakeni yamashumi amabili – kodwa ungathola nezihambi ezindala kaningi.
Iningi lamathempeli linawo umkhosi Waminyaka Yonke oqala ekupheleni kukaNovemba kuya Phakathi kukaMeyi, okuhluka kuya ngekhalenda laminyaka yonke lethempeli ngalinye.
Abanye ososayensi bacabanga ukuthi ama-Ticeratop ayedla ama-cycad, okuwuhlobo lwezitshalo olwaluvamile e-Cretaceous.
Ngo-11:20, amaphoyisa acele ababhikishi ukuthi bahlehlele endaweni yabahamba ngezinyawo, bethi kudingeka balinganisele phakathi kwelungelo lokubhikisha kanye nesiminyaminya esakhekayo.
Ezinye izehlakalo zokushushuluza eqhweni zizoba sendaweni yase-Taizicheng yokushushuluza eqhweni e-Zhangjiakou, cishe ama-220 km (140 amamayela) kusuka eBeijing.
Noma ubani ohlela ukuvakashela izwe elizobhekwa njengesizinda sempi kumelwe athole ukuqeqeshwa okukhethekile.

Umkhumbi-mkhathi ojikeleza inyanga ongenamshayeli iChandrayaan-1 wakhipha Isihloli saso Samandla Okushayisana Enyangeni (MIP), esashwizashwiza eNyangeni ngamakhilomitha angu-1.5 ngomzuzwana (amamayeli angu-3000 ngehora) futhi yehlela ngamandla ngokuyimpumelelo eduze neningizimu yeNyanga.
Futhi, ezindaweni ezifudumele amabhakithiliya kokubili akhula ngokushesha kakhudwlana futhi aphila isikhathi eside kakhudlwana ngaphandle komzimba.
Kwezinye izikhathi ukuvakasha kwasemoyeni kochwephesha kuya phakathi nezwe, ukugibela izintaba noma ukufinyelela kuyiPole, enesiqu esikhulu.
Ulwele lwenza ubuthi obungaxhwalisa izinzwa kokubili ebantwini nasezinhlanzini.

IMibuso Emithathu kwakungenye yenkathi yegazi eliningi kunazo zonke emlandweni waseShayina yakuDala, izinkulungwane zabantu zafa zilwela ukuhlala esihlalweni esiphakeme kakhulu esigodlweni esihle e-Xi’an.
Uma uya ogwini kuphela usebenzisa uhambo lomkhumbi olufishane angeke udinge i-visa ehlukile (kusukela ngo-2009).
Ucwaningo lunikeza nokuqonda ngokuvela kwezimpaphe ezinyonini.
Ezinye iziguli zithole igciwane esibhedlela, kucabanga uDkt. Moll, futhi okungenani ababili bekuyizisebenzi zempilo zasesibhedlela.
Lapho uya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kungenzeka ukuthi babebekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi izivakashi uma zifika ezweni elisha zidinga ukujwayela.
Ukusesha ezindaweni zokuhlola sekube okuxhantelayo kakhulu enkathini yangemva kuka-2001, Septemba 11.
Abantu manje babhala imilayezo ezikrinini zamakhompyutha, bangasadingi ukusondela emshinini wokucija amapensela.
Abacwaningi basikisela ukuthi, ngisho noma lona kungumsila we-dinosaur, isampula liveza izimpaphe zendala futhi hhayi isihluphe somntwanyana.
Izinga le-pH likhonjwa inani lama-ion weHydrogen (i-H kuyi-pH) kuyikhemikhali elihlolwayo.
Ngeshwa, uma wenza iDVD, imingcele yayo cishe izosikeka nayo, futhi uma ividiyo ibinamazwi abhalwayo eduze nasezansi, angeke avezwe ngokugcwele.
Bekungekho ukulibaziseka ngenxa yezimoto eziningi okubikiwe emgwaqweni omkhulu, enye indlela yokungena edolobheni.
Ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati amancanyana ngobukhulu adla inyama ebanjelwa ukudliwakusuka kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni.
Uhlobo lomkhuhlane wezinyoni olubulalayo ebantwini, i-H5N1, kuqinisekisiwe ukuthi luhlasele idada lasendle, elatholakala ngoMsombuluko, endaweni yamaxhaphozi eduze naseLyon empumalanga neFulansi.
Amapulangi kajantshi cishe enzelwa ukuhlanganisa ujantshi. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, nokho, kwabonakala ukuthi ujantshi ungasebenza kangcono uma ungaba nommombo wensimbi ngaphezulu.
Isibonakaliso esihle kakhulu soshevu ovela ngaphakathi kungaba ukuba khona kwezitsha zemithi ezivulekile noma amakhemikhali wasendlini anobuthi.
Lokhu kunikeza ithuba elihle lokubona Ukukhanya okunqabile okuye kuvele esibhakabhakeni esiphezulu, njengoba isibhakabhaka sizofiphala cishe usuku lonke.
Indawo yaseTheki iyenza izwe elikhulu kakhulu lama-37 emhlabeni, futhi ingalingana neDolobha Elikhulu laseFulansi noMbuso Ohlangene kuhlangene.
Umkhulumeli Wendlu uNewt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye nelungu lesishaya-mthetho lowesifazane uMichele Bachmann baqede endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, kanye neyesithupha, ngokulandelana.
I-archipelago isendaweni eqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-120 enyakatho yeNhlonhlo. Enkulu kuwo i-King George enendawo e-Villa Las Estrellas.
Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W Bush wasamukela isimemezelo.
Ziningi Izinto ongakhetha kuzona, kodwa lokhu kuhlala kuyilokho abantu abakushoyo uma bekhuluma "ngokuya e-Disney World."

Izinhloso eziphambili zase-Italy kwakungamazwe ase-Afrika. Ukuze bathumbe lawo mazwe, babezodinga indawo yokuthumela amasosha, ukuze kuthi njengoba amasosha ewela uLwandle iMedithera ngemikhumbi ahlasele i-Afrika.
INingizimu Afrika esesikhundleni esiphezulu emqhudelwaneni iqale kahle lapho iwina ngo-26 -00 kalula lapho idlala neZambia esesikhundleni sesihlanu.
Besenkalishini, babuyela emuva ePherisi bezungezwe uquqaba lwabantu oluklabalasa kanye nokumemeza izinsongo ngokumelene neNkosi kanye neNdlovukazi.
Othole imedali yesiliva emdlalweni wama-Olimpiki ngo-2004 u-Amir Khan uthe, "Ekujuleni ngaphakathi ngicabanga ukuthi abantu besifazane akumelwe ukuthi balwe. Umbono wami lowo."
I-Beijing izobungaza imicimbi yokuvula neyokuvala kanye nemidlalo yeqhwa yangaphakathi.
Lenkumbulo iphikisana nokusho ukuthi inyanga ayinawo umsebenzi wokwakhekha ngokuphelele.
Kunokwakheka okuningi okuhlukile kwamehlo, okuhlukayo ngokuba inkimbinkimbi kuye ngezimfuneko zento ephilayo.
Indawo yaseSchengen, nokho, isebenza ngandlelathile njengezwe elilodwa kulokhu.
Kuyo yonke iminyaka yawo-1960, uBrzezinski wasebenzela uJohn F. Kennedy njengomeluleki bese uhulumeni kaLyndon B. Johnson.
Ngo-1957 i-Luxembourg yaba yilungu elisungulayo lenhlangano namuhla eyaziwa ngokuthi iNyunyoni yaseYurophu.
Indaba evezwe kuyi-opera yaseFulansi, ngu-Camille Saint-Saens, iciko “elikuphila kwalo kwathathwa uthando lwezidakamizwa kanye ne-Japani.”
Ngemva kwezinkinga zempi zasekuqaleni, u-Ethelred wakwazi ukuvumelana no-Olaf, owabuyela e-Norway eyozama ukuthola umbuso wakhe ngempumelelo exubene.
Ngokulandelayo uye watholakala eSibhedlela i-Addenbrooke e-Cambridge.
Inkathi yezivakashi ezindaweni zamagquma iyenyuka phakathi nehlobo laseNdiya.
Okunye kuhlanganisa isiqhingi seLivingston, kanye neDeception lapho imbobo enkulu egcwele udaka lwentabamlilo esaphuquka umlilo yenza itheku elimangalisayo elingokwemvelo.

Omunye umjaho wakhe, i-Giant Slalom, waqeda engoweshumi eqenjini labesifazane elalihlezi nesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4:41.30, wayesemuva ngo-2:11.60 kuu-Austrian Claudia Loesch owathatha indawo yokuqala futhi wayesemuva ngo- 1:09.02 k-uGyöngyi Dani wase-Hungary owaqeda ekwindawo yesishiyagalolunye.
UMurray ulahlekelwe ingxenye yakhe yomdlalo emdlalweni wokubona ukuthi kuwina bani kwabalinganayo ngamaphuzu ngemva kokuthi womabili amadoda ayelingana ezinyeni zawo zomdlalo.
Umbukiso onxa-ntathu womsindo nokukhanya ungenye yezinto ezithakazelisayo endaweni yezingane.
Nakuba ukuhlolwa kwabantu abathuthela kwelinye izwe kungenziwa uma ufika ezweni lakho, ukudlula lapho kuhlolwa khona izincwadi kusenzima.
Uma uthatha iholide usekhaya lakho, unesikhathi sokuzijabulisa nesokuthatha imizuzu embalwa yokwenza okuthile okubalulekile.
Amanye ama-athomu anobuphakathi obuxegayo okusho ukuthi avame ukuphuka lapho eqhikinyezwa kancane noma lapho engaqhikinyezwanga.
Ntambama ngeSonto, uMongameli waseMelika u-Donald Trump, esitatimendeni esikhishwe unobhala wephephandaba, umemezele ukuthi amasosha aseMelika azoshiya elaseSiriya.
Isiphuphutheki esisemkhathini sithola ucingo bese siluthumela emuva ezansi, cishe ngaleso sikhathi.

Omunye umGreki odumile usozibalo uPythagoras, owaziwa kakhulu ngomqondo wakhe oqinisekiswa ngokuchasiselwa odumile omayelana nokuhlangana phakathi kwezinhlangothi zonxantathu abanezinhlangothi ezimbili eziqondene ngqo.

Abanye abantu babecabanga ukuthi unembile kodwa abantu abaningi babekholelwa okuhlukile; ukuthi Isimo Samapulanethi Sokuzungeza Ilanga sasizungeza uMhlaba, kuhlanganise neLanga (kanye nezinye izinkanyezi).

Amahhlo okugembula ngokujwayelekile enza imizamo yokuba izivakashi zichithe isikhathi nemali eningi ngangokunokwenzeka. Amafasitela namakilogo ngokuvamile awekho, futhi kungaba nzima ukuthola izindawo zokuphuma.
Edlanzaneni leziqhingi nasemachibini awudingi isikebhe.
Ehlobo, ikakhulukazi, kuzomelwe uqaphele omiyane uma unquma ukuhamba ehlathini lemvula.
Ifilimu, eno-Ryan Gosling noEmma Stone, ikhethelwe ukuwina kuzo zonke izigaba ezinkulu.
Kuyifanele ingxenye yehora ukuhambahamba emzaneni othakazelisayo.
Izinkanyezi zikhipha ukukhanya nokushisa ngenxa yamandla enzekayo lapho ama-athomu e-hydrogen ahlangana (noma axubana) ndawonye ukwakha izakhi ezisinda kakhudlwana.
Ngo-1995 wavotelwa njengomdlali ohamba phambili kunabo bonke emlandweni wasePartizan.
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala inqubo yokuvuka ngenhloso phakathi nesikhathi sakho sokulala esivamile nokuzumeka futhi ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho (imizuzu engu-10–60).
Amakhompyutha namuhla asetshenziselwa ukusebenza ngezithombe namavidiyo.
ERogaland nase-Agder zivame ukubizwa ngokuthi "hei" okusho inkangala engenamithi kaningi embozwe i-heather.

Emananini adlulele wokuvota, amaphesentu angu-29 walabo ababuzwe imibuzo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka, kuyilapho amaphesenti angu-31 akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki.
